modules.name: CV-MAP
modules.description: Add CV automation to 32 parameters of any module

modules.name: CTX for CV-MAP
modules.description: Expander for context menu mapping using CV-MAP

modules.name: µMAP
modules.description: Add CV automation to one parameter of any module

modules.name: CV-PAM
modules.description: Generate CV from any parameter change of any module

modules.name: ROTOR Model A
modules.description: Rotates a signal across polyphonic channels

modules.name: ReMOVE Lite
modules.description: Recorder for parameter automation

modules.name: BOLT
modules.description: Polyphonic logic boolean functions with modulation and sample & hold

modules.name: INFIX
modules.description: Insert for polyphonic cables

modules.name: µINFIX
modules.description: Insert for polyphonic cables

modules.name: STRIP
modules.description: Manage a group of modules by using the expander-mechanism, providing load, save, copy, paste, disable, enable and randomize

modules.name: STRIP-BAY
modules.description: Utility module for STRIP keeping inputs/outputs connected

modules.name: S++
modules.description: Adds hotkeys for pasting and importing selections while preserving parameter mappings

modules.name: 8FACE
modules.description: Universal expander for sequencing up to eight presets of any module

modules.name: 8FACEx2
modules.description: Universal expander for sequencing up to sixteen presets of any module

modules.name: MIDI-CAT
modules.description: Mapping module for MIDI CCs and notes to parameters of any module, similar to VCV MIDI-MAP

modules.name: MEM for MIDI-CAT
modules.description: Memory-expander for MIDI-CAT

modules.name: CTX for MIDI-CAT
modules.description: Expander for context menu mapping using MIDI-CAT

modules.name: SIPO
modules.description: Serial-in parallel-out shift register with polyphonic output and CV controls for skipping and incrementing on sampled values

modules.name: 4ROUNDS
modules.description: Randomizer for up to 16 input signals to create 15 output signals

modules.name: ARENA
modules.description: 2-dimensional XY-Mixer for 8 sources with various modulation targets and fun graphical interface

modules.name: MAZE
modules.description: 4 channel sequencer running on a 2-dimensional grid

modules.name: HIVE
modules.description: 4 channel sequencer running on a 2-dimensional hexagonal grid

modules.name: INTERMIX
modules.description: Precision adder 8x8 switch matrix with scene-support

modules.name: INTERMIX-GATE
modules.description: Expander for INTERMIX outputting a gate-signal for each active row

modules.name: INTERMIX-ENV
modules.description: Expander for INTERMIX outputting envelopes for a selected input-column

modules.name: INTERMIX-FADE
modules.description: Expander for INTERMIX for setting individual fade values

modules.name: SAIL
modules.description: Control any parameter currently hovered by mouse with CV, especially useful with MIDI-CC or MIDI-STEP

modules.name: PILE
modules.description: Translate increment triggers or decrement triggers in an absolute voltage, especially useful with MIDI-STEP, with slew support

modules.name: POLY-PILE
modules.description: Translate increment triggers or decrement triggers in an absolute voltage, especially useful with MIDI-STEP, with slew support

modules.name: MIDI-STEP
modules.description: Module for relative modes of endless knobs on your MIDI controller, such as Arturia Beatstep, Native Instruments Komplete Keyboards or Behringer X-TOUCH

modules.name: MIRROR
modules.description: Utility for synchronizing module parameters

modules.name: AFFIX
modules.description: Insert for polyphonic cables for adding offsets in Volt, semitones or octaves (16 channels)

modules.name: µAFFIX
modules.description: Insert for polyphonic cables for adding offsets in Volt, semitones or octaves (8 channels)

modules.name: GRIP
modules.description: Lock for module parameters

modules.name: GLUE
modules.description: Label maker for your modules!

modules.name: GOTO
modules.description: Utility for jumping directly to 10 locations in your patch by hotkey or using MIDI

modules.name: STROKE
modules.description: Utility for converting hotkeys to triggers, gates and some other special commands

modules.name: SPIN
modules.description: Utility for converting mouse-wheel movement into triggers, also handles middle-click of mouse, useful for SAIL

modules.name: TRANSIT
modules.description: Parameter-morpher and sequencer for up to 96 snapshots

modules.name: +T
modules.description: Expander for TRANSIT

modules.name: X4
modules.description: Dual multiple for parameter-mapping

modules.name: MACRO
modules.description: Macro-knob for controlling multiple parameters, with attenuverts and slew-limiting

modules.name: RAW
modules.description: Digital effect based on the dynamics of bistable systems

modules.name: MIDI-MON
modules.description: Monitor for MIDI messages

modules.name: ORBIT
modules.description: Polyphonic stereo field spreader

modules.name: 8FACE mk2
modules.description: Universal expander for sequencing up to eight presets of multiple modules
Expander for 8FACE mk2

modules.name: MIDI-PLUG
modules.description: Virtual MIDI merger and splitter

modules.name: DIRT
modules.description: Crosstalk and noise for polyphonic cables (preview)

modules.name: MIDI-KEY
modules.description: Converts MIDI CC or note messages into keyboard events (preview)

modules.name: AUDIO-64
modules.description: Sends CV and audio to/from an audio device

modules.name: MB
modules.description: Experimental replacement module browsers for Rack. Brings back the browser from Rack v0.6x and has a modified browser from Rack v1.x with adjustable preview size, favorites, extended filtering options and more.

modules.name: ME
modules.description: Mouse enhancements
